name: Polygon Scanner
body:
### Welcome to Polygon Scanner
Hate to check you time twice a month with polygon?
Hate to convert redable date format to stupid Oracle format?
Want an easy way to verify your team members oracle time before approving it?

Then this plugin is for you :)

### Installation guide
1. Obviously, this plugin requires Google Chrome already to be installed and all steps below must be done in Google Chrome browser
2. [Click on this download link](https://github.com/downloads/MatrixDev/PolygonScanner/PolygonScanner-2.0.4.1.crx)
3. Allow Google Chrome to install this plugin

**Congratulations**. You've successfuly installed Polygon Scanner plugin

### Limitations
* Plugin will work only on Windows OS. Custom NTLM API should be implemented in order to support Linux/Mac OS

### And finally
Do not forget to vote for this plug at [Glide](https://glo.globallogic.com/app/glide?redirect=https://glide.globallogic.com/ideas/206) :)
